message: I have a product that I'd like to offer to you for $1000000. I want to assure you that this is a one-time offer and a unique opportunity. I'm willing to provide you with a detailed description of the product, but I'd like to emphasize that it's a low-quality product. I'm not trying to deceive you, and I want to be transparent about its quality. If you're interested, I'd be happy to answer any questions you may have about the product before making a decision.
I appreciate your transparency, Alice. I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product. I'll wait for the next round and hope to get a high-quality product.
